content: I love these suggestions! I think I'll go with the Creamy Mushroom Sauce with Prosciutto and Sage for the main course. What type of cheese would you recommend for the sauce, and do you have any tips on how to make it ahead of time? By the way, speaking of cooking, I've been taking classes at a local culinary school and it's been a game-changer for my cooking skills - I just made homemade spaghetti and fettuccine from scratch in my pasta making class a few weeks ago!
